articles.title: Genelia on Vidyut's Khuda Haafiz being snubbed at big OTT announcement: Fair to expect an invitation - India Today
articles.description: Vidyut Jammwal was not invited to Disney+Hotstar big announcement on Monday to represent his film Khuda Haafiz. Genelia D'Souza took to social media to show her support for her Force co-star.
articles.content: On Monday, Disney+Hotstar conducted a virtual press conference to announce the digital release of seven big films. While lead actors of four of the seven films took part in the meet - which includes … [+4595 chars]

articles.description: During the virtual press conference on Monday, Akshay Kumar said that he had to be extremely careful while portraying the character of a transperson without offending any community.
